message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.IT, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with edge-preserving smoothing, which is a common problem in computer vision and graphics. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a new method that embeds the bilateral filter in the least squares model for efficient edge-preserving smoothing, which involves optimization and numerical methods. Therefore, it could also belong to cs.IT (Information Theory) or cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions the flexibility of the proposed method, which can be extended by replacing the bilateral filter with its variants, indicating that it could also belong to cs.MM (Multimedia) or cs.GR (Graphics).
